title: kxp
author: kxp
content: Anyone know if any currently available crypto card has this feature (more preferable if that card was in EUR)? Thanks.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: crypto.com Cards and Bitpanda Card.You can find more of these cards by searching for crypto cards and then manually searching for the properties.In some of these cards, it comes as an additional feature and not a substitute for SMS OTP

comments.author: kxp
comments.body: Quote from: Yamane_Keto on December 01, 2023, 02:56:45 AMcrypto.com Cards and Bitpanda Card.Thanks for the info.QuoteYou can find more of these cards by searching for crypto cards and then manually searching for the properties.The thing is, not all of them are clear about this. comments.author: ZAINmalik75
comments.body: Quote from: kxp on December 01, 2023, 03:57:41 PMBtw do you by chance know an exhaustive list of available crypto cards? ----- So with the two you named is it an additional feature or does the static password replace SMS OTP?You can find a list of all crypto cards on this thread: [V2] Big List of Crypto Debit Cards  This list is full of almost every card but I never used any crypto card before and to be honest I never thought about 3d authentication like fingerprints or any other security type etc. It would be good to do 2FA with such things as we fingerprint scanners but OTP are also fine.I hope you will find some cards from the list but I was unable to find one, this thread has only 1 or 2 replies yet and if other will find this topic they will definitely answer you straight forward and you can get more answers to your query. You might use another crypto wallet which of course comes with 3d security features but I never heard about any card providing 3d security. Even the ones that the first member has suggested never heard about them.
